name: Short Circuit (itch) (feraswheel)
description:
This game was created for the Mini Jam 100 - Overload.

The purpose of the game is to not overload the circuit board while making a direct current from the start position, all the way to the end without short circuiting the board.

Controls

  • Left Click
    • Create a positive point. When the current reaches it, it will increase in size.
  • Right Click
    • Create a negative point. When the current reaches it, it will decrease in size.
  • Scroll up/down
    • Zoom in/out.
  • A
    • Follow the current, release to track the latest point created.

Be careful not to run out of charges! Keep an eye out and collect them as you go!

Goal

Collect all the orange (Z) charges (100 on the map) and reach the end of the maze.

Obstacles

Be careful, if the current reaches the end without any connections, game over, if you get too large and touch the edge, game over. If an orange charge is missed, you would need to go through the maze again to collect it.

There are also Blue/Black charges which will increase/decrease the speed of the current. Be sure not to let it go to fast!
